beginning1.line: I don't remember asking for your god damn life story, captain exposition. Jesus.
MISSION PARAMETERS NEED TO BE CLEAR. HISTORY OF REGION IMPORTANT.
What's important is that I get you people off my ass. I don't even want to be here.
WHAT YOU WANT IS IRRELEVANT. THE MISSION IS RELEVANT. THE MISSION IS YOUR LIFE.
Yeah yeah, just let me do what I do best: kick ass. Heh. Over and out.
REMEMBER: THE PRESIDENT IS KEY. YOU SHOULD BE ARRIVING NEAR THE CRASH SITE.
What part of 'over and out' don't you get? Shut the hell up already.
Shit, I think they've spotted me!
